name: What if...?
description:
A sim-style city builder and management game which explores the duality between the environment and urban development.  Try to find a balance between development and nature.

PLAYER CONTROLS:

Hover over a building tile to view the tile details.  Click on a selected tile to pick up.  Click on grid position to place desired tile.  Tiles can not be removed once placed. 

 Have fun building your tiny world!

CREDITS:

Pranee McKinlay - Game Designer, Production Manager, & Artist

Twitter:  @PraneeMcKinlay

Twitter:  @muzboz

Max Kearney - Musician

Twitter:  @KearneyMax

NB: The current windows standalone version available for download is the end of GGJ2022 prototype.  Unfortunately, some placeholder art is still in place due to running out of time!  Please come back to play future updates.

Thanks for your interest in our little game jam project!

Made for Global Game Jam 2022

#GGJ2022
